article_title: Live blog: CU Buffs drop 2OT thriller to UCLA
article_text:
Print Email Font Resize Font Resize Live blog: CU Buffs drop 2OT thriller to UCLA

Colorado's Tony Jones tries to escape UCLA's Eric Kendricks in the first half. (Cliff Grassmick/Daily Camera) Live game coverage and curated content from around the web during the CU Buffs' football game vs. No. 25 UCLA on Saturday, Oct. 25. Kickoff is at noon. Television coverage is on the Pac-12 Network.
